backend/main.mo: Actor placeholder with no implemented functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report listing implemented features, related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Contains prewritten summaries describing purpose of various frontend components and config files.
frontend/index.css: Defines Tailwind layers, theme variables, and base styling for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML shell mounting the React app at #root and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React component that renders sections conditionally based on siteConfig visibility.
frontend/src/components/CakeSection.tsx: Interactive cake UI with candle-blowout animation and popup dialog triggered on click.
frontend/src/components/FinaleSection.ts: Romantic finale section displaying themed messages, icons, and a styled sender signature.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer that generates navigation buttons from siteConfig and scrolls to sections smoothly.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Image gallery showing visible images from config with modal support for viewing selections.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders a sticky header with logo, navigation buttons, and a dark/light theme toggle, using section scroll behavior.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Displays the intro hero section with themed text, images, and buttons that scroll to other sections based on visibility.
frontend/src/components/ImageCard.tsx: Shows a gallery image card with hover effects, lazy loading, and click handling to open a modal.
frontend/src/components/ImageModal.tsx: Provides a modal to display an enlarged image with title, description, and optional debug info.
frontend/src/components/MusicControl.tsx: Implements floating music controls with play/pause and adjustable volume using a popover slider.
frontend/src/components/RobloxSection.ts: Renders a themed section highlighting Roblox adventures with descriptive text and an image.
frontend/src/content/siteConfig.ts: Defines configuration for section visibility, gallery images, navigation items, and debug options.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to identity changes, invalidating queries when the actor updates.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, exposing identity state, login, logout, and status flags.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder hook returning an empty object for future backend queries.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, dark mode tokens, fonts, and custom animations.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider before rendering App.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration enabling dark mode, plugins, OKLCH-based theme extensions, and custom container and font settings.
project_state.json: Metadata describing project status, architecture, issues, and required/generated image assets.
